name: Wolf & Badger
description:
Wolf & Badger is a multi-channel retail platform for the finest independent, ethical and unique brands from around the globe. Founded in 2010 by Henry and George – the Graham brothers – Wolf & Badger is now home to over 700 of the world’s best fashion and design brands.

Our mission is to introduce our stylish customers to limited-edition, sustainable and high-quality products while providing a much-needed platform for independent brands to thrive.

jobs.title: Javascript Developer
jobs.description:
Are you an experienced front-end developer seeking a full-time role within a rapid growth, Series A funded, e-commerce business?

Wolf & Badger is a fast growing and innovative technology led retail business with teams in London and New York that has exciting and ambitious plans for the next stages of development on its bespoke e-commerce platform.

We are currently seeking a motivated and creative front-end developer with Javascript and React expertise to help us build new and engaging interfaces for our online marketplace.

Based in our London HQ in Kings Cross you will:

- Take a lead role in the modernisation of our brand facing platform.
- Assist in rebuilding key parts of our customer facing platform in ReactJS, including our bespoke marketplace checkout.
- Work with A/B testing tools (Qubit) to rapidly validate hypothesis, and be responsible for converting successful experiments into robust and maintainable code.
- Work closely with the back-end development team.
- Maintain and iterate on our existing customer facing codebase built with LESS and JQuery and help to refactor and rationalise some older parts of the codebase.

**Requirements**

Required

The ideal candidate will have 3+ years experience in:

- JavaScript/JQuery
- ReactJS
- Bootstrap/HTML5/CSS3
- Experience with LESS or SCSS or other pre-processors
- A/B testing principles and tools

Desirable

- Experience using GatsbyJS
- Related degree

You will be working on top of Python & Django applications and must be able to work well with a team of in-house developers.

**Benefits**

- Competitive salary, dependent on experience
- Creative work environment within Coal Drops Yard, Kings Cross
- Flexible working hours, with a mix of in-house and remote work possible
- 25 days in addition to bank holidays, plus paid ‘pet-ernity’ and heartbreak leave
- Discounts on cafe, restaurant and retail at Wolf & Badger
- ClassPass membership
- Excellent career opportunities in a rapidly growing international business

jobs.title: Python/Django Developer
jobs.description:
Wolf & Badger is an innovative technology-led retail business with teams in London and New York, that has exciting and ambitious plans for the next stages of development on its bespoke e-commerce platform.

We are currently seeking a talented and motivated Python developer to help us maintain and build exciting new features and support our fast growing business.

We have a small, cross-functional, focussed team of engineers. We work in sprints and practice continuous deployment through Gitlab.

Our product is a custom built e-commerce platform, within Python and Django in the backend stack, and Bootstrap, JavaScript and CSS on the frontend.

Based in our London HQ in Kings Cross you will:

- Work closely and collaborate with our Head of Product, Business Intelligence Engineer and the development team to deliver innovative, efficient and valuable features
- Work alongside non-technical stakeholders to implement considered solutions that meet complex business requirements
- Maintain and improve our product/codebase, considering scalability and the end user at all times

Requirements

- Passionate about solving complex, challenging and interesting business problems 
- You should have solid professional experience with Python and Django, with a thorough approach to testing
- An independent worker, comfortable both working alone and as part of a team of in-house developers
- Agile/Scrum experience

Applicants for this role will thrive in an entrepreneurial environment and be highly self-motivated and passionate.

**Requirements**

**Technical requirements:**

- Python/Django
- Celery/Redis
- PostgreSQL
- Unix based software i.e. Linux, Debian or OSX
- HTML/CSS/jQuery
- Degree in related field eg Computer Science

**Desirable:**

- Dev ops tools (eg. Docker or Kubernetes)
- CI/CD experience (eg. CodeShip, CircleCI, Travis)
- Experience working with Apache or NGINX
- Automation test experience (the team use Selenium)
- Experience in Ecommerce/Retail

**Benefits**

- Competitive salary, dependent on experience
- Creative work environment within Coal Drops Yard, Kings Cross
- Flexible working hours, with a mix of in-house and remote work possible
- 25 days in addition to bank holidays
- Paid pet-ernity and heartbreak leave
- Discounts on cafe, restaurant and retail at Wolf & Badger
- Excellent career opportunities in a rapidly growing international business
